Game Text: Opponent must discard top 2 cards from Draw Pile into Dead Pile.One Per Deck

Game Text: Any Front Line Character may make 1 attack after opponent has conceded the battle. Opponent may defend. One Per Deck

Game Text: Avoids all attacks from 1 Teamwork card, or target hero must discard 1 placed Teamwork card. One Per Deck

Name: Any Hero - Gamma Terror

Name: Assault on Onslaught™ - Do or Die
Flavor Text: Daily Bugle: Do or Die! As a final do-or-die strategy, the heroes decided to save the best for last...
Game Text: Before discarding, take one card from your hand and put it on the bottom of the draw pile.

Name: Any Hero - Unlucky at Love
Game Text: Spurned by the Black Cat! Any 1 of opponent's heroes is -2 to defense for remainder of battle One Per Deck

Name: Any Mission - Hideout Discovered!
Distribution: Given to the attendants of GenCon'96, held at Milwaukee, Wisconsin, August 1996.
Flavor Text: Daily Bugle: Hideout Discoverd! Intense investigation revealed a secret cache of gold, jewels and technology, leaving only the question, "Who will feel the pain of this sting?"
Game Text: Discard all placed Teamwork Teamwork Universe cards. No Teamwork Universe cards may be played this battle.

Name: Any Hero - Web-Headed Wizard
Distribution: Available as an insert in Wizard Magazine #50 (Oct 1995).
Game Text: Immediately exchange this card for any 1 card in Dead Pile One Per Deck

Name: Assault on Onslaught™ - Helping Hands
Flavor Text: Daily Bugle: Helping Hands From out of nowhere, the heroes received assistance in their desperate time of need...
Game Text: Draw two cards after the discard phase. Do not discard if duplicates.

Name: Assault on Onslaught™ - Fighting Spirit Lives!
Flavor Text: Daily Bugle: Fighting Spirit Lives! As heroes fell by the wayside, their spirit was carried forward for those that remained...
Game Text: All Special Cards in your hand may be played by any hero, for remainder of battle.

Name: Assault on Onslaught 1 - "Unity in Chaos"
Flavor Text: Onslaught stand revealed! Gather the combined might of the Avengers and the X-men and prepare for the pandemonium that is to come. [ End ]

Name: Assault on Onslaught™ - Spy Discovered!
Flavor Text: Daily Bugle: Spy Discovered! The recent acquisition of the enemy's plans proved a temporary victory when a spy was discovered...
Game Text: After placing, reveal any 4 cards in your hand to your opponent.

Name: Assault on Onslaught™ - On the Move
Flavor Text: Daily Bugle: On the Move With no time to think, the heroes charged into battle, as the enemy forces were on the move...
Game Text: No Intellect Power Cards may be played this battle. Affected Power Cards are not discarded.

Name: Assault on Onslaught 2 - "Incredible Forces"
Flavor Text: The most powerful physical force on the planet is at the command of Onslaught! Triumph now, or face ultimate devastation! [ End ]

Name: Avenger's ID Card
Game Text: Teammate may use Tactic: Double Shot cards, with normal contribution, to avoid any attack.
Numbers: Cost/Effect: 6 Intellect and Teammate with 5 Any-Power or less to use

Name: Assault on Onslaught 3 - "Child of the Future"
Flavor Text: The nightmare of darkness grows as Franklin Richards becomes one with Onslaught. Cast aside prejudice and unite with your enemies in an effort to achieve a greater good. [ End ]

Name: Assault on Onslaught 4 - "Display of Power"
Flavor Text: The helicarrier is destroyed, and Manhattan in ruins as Onslaught and his minions take the east coast. Muster your power and save the denizens of New York. [ End ]

Name: Assault on Onslaught 5 - "Sphere of Influence"
Flavor Text: Onslaught's army of sentinels marches unopposed across the Earth. Race against the clock in order to stop Onslaught's forces before the human resistance uses its nuclear solution. [ End ]

Name: Assault on Onslaught 6 - "Desperate Reunion"
Flavor Text: Divide and conquer, for sacrifice may be your only chance. Struggle to remove a crucial piece of Onslaught with the hope that it will reverse the process that created him! [ End ]

Name: Assault on Onslaught 7 - "Ground Zero"
Flavor Text: Face the dual threat of Onslaught and a devastating nuclear strike and bring the conflict to an end. Or a new beginning? [ End ]

Name: Captain Universe
